name: Ken Cheng

experience.title: CPSC201 Peer Tutor
experience.detail: Host office hours weekly and teach CPSC201 students

bio: I am a sophomore CS major. My interests include coding, volleyball (I play on the school team), tennis, and cooking. I spent some time doing computer vision in high school, and I work in the Social Robotics Lab at Yale, alongside TAing CS classes. In my free time, I like to explore new realms of CS that I'm not yet familiar with.
smallBio: A coder that is always down to challenge himself and try something new!
